Class MXMLSemanticProblem

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISourceLocation, ICompilerProblem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MXMLAttributeVersionProblem, MXMLClassNodeProblem, MXMLConstructorHasParametersProblem, MXMLDualContentProblem, MXMLDuplicateAttributeProblem, MXMLDuplicateChildTagProblem, MXMLDuplicateIDProblem, MXMLEmptyAttributeProblem, MXMLEmptyEventHandlerProblem, MXMLFinalClassProblem, MXMLIncludeInAndExcludeFromProblem, MXMLIncompatibleArrayElementProblem, MXMLIncompatibleVectorElementProblem, MXMLInvalidDefinitionNameProblem, MXMLInvalidIDProblem, MXMLInvalidItemCreationPolicyProblem, MXMLInvalidItemDestructionPolicyProblem, MXMLInvalidPercentageProblem, MXMLInvalidSourceAttributeProblem, MXMLInvalidStyleProblem, MXMLInvalidTextForTypeProblem, MXMLInvalidVectorFixedAttributeProblem, MXMLInvalidVectorTypeAttributeProblem, MXMLLibraryTagNotTheFirstChildProblem, MXMLMissingRootTagProblem, MXMLMissingVectorTypeAttributeProblem, MXMLNoAllowedAttributesProblem, MXMLNotAClassProblem, MXMLOtherLanguageNamespaceProblem, MXMLPercentageNotAllowedProblem, MXMLPrivateAttributeProblem, MXMLPrivateTagLocationProblem, MXMLRequiredAttributeProblem, MXMLSameBindingSourceAndDestinationProblem, MXMLUnexpectedAttributeProblem, MXMLUnexpectedDatabindingProblem, MXMLUnexpectedTagProblem, MXMLUnexpectedTextProblem, MXMLUnknownNamespaceProblem, MXMLUnknownXMLFormatProblem, MXMLUnresolvedTagProblem, MXMLXMLListMixedContentProblem, MXMLXMLOnlyOneRootTagProblem, MXMLXMLRequireContentProblem

    public class MXMLSemanticProblem
extends SemanticProblem
    This is the base class for semantic problems in MXML documents.

    Note that its constructors allow you to pass MXML DOM objects such as IMXMLTagData and IMXMLTagAttributeData, from which the problem location is derived.
